description: Texture mapping configuration for Fresh Voxel Engine block types

Stone.description: Gray stone texture on all faces

Dirt.description: Brown dirt texture on all faces

Grass.description: Grass block with green top and dirt bottom

Sand.description: Sandy yellow texture on all faces

Water.description: Blue water texture with transparency (animation support planned)

notes: Textures support multiple resolutions for different quality settings
Use 'all_faces' for uniform textures on all 6 faces of a cube
Transparent blocks use alpha channel for see-through effects
